headline.main: BURMA AIR ACTION PRESSED AT AKYAB; R.A.F. Bombers Again Blast Japanese Positions in Area of British Land Drive

abstract: Burma campaign: RAF blasts Jap positions, Yegyan, Byen and Khadinbaik, Akyab Is; executes offensive patrols over Mayu Peninsula
